divs: Sighting Detailsi was on my way home from work when i noticed this brighter then normal flying object in the sky, i pulled over to watch it, to see if it had flashing lights like our aircraft's, it did not.. it was flying in one direction then just shot out in another direction, hour or so later i saw it again maybe another one not sure had same look though, just slowly move across the sky then stopped in one spot stayed there forever, 4 hours tops, i sat and watched it the whole time, one the occasions the lights got dark then bright again, one time the lights just went off when an airplane flew right around where it was the lights shot back on bright like blinding bright.. by midnight the light had vanished... my husband thinks im crazy but i know what i saw!!!!
Summary: bight blinking light hovered then lights dim then redish orange glow appeared, hovered for 4 hours tops just slowly moving
